title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 161: Featuring Matthew Barnaby
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by former NHL pest Matthew Barnaby. Matthew joins to talk all about his career and some of the guys he played with and he obviously doesn't hold anything back. The guys also discuss Biz in NYC, some NHL news including some impressive Keith Yandle stats, Bob Nicholson's comments about the Oilers, plus a bunch more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
